title: Google Pixel Stand: Release date, specs, features and UK price
description:
![google pixel
stand](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)

**The new[Google Pixel 3](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/google-
pixel-3-release-date-price-3316812) may may have stolen most of the headlines
at the firm’s latest ‘Made by Google’ launch event, but Google has also
finally taken the wraps off of its long-awaited Pixel Stand.**

It takes advantage of one of the Pixel 3’s headline features: wireless
charging. Here’s everything you need to know about the shiny new accessory.

**Read more:[Best smartphone](https://www.trustedreviews.com/best/best-
smartphone-3431175)**

## Google Pixel Stand: Price, release date and features

First and foremost, price and availability. The Pixel Stand costs £69 in the
UK, and it’s available to pre-order right
[here](https://store.google.com/product/pixel_stand). At the time of
publication, Google Store says it will start shipping on November 8.

So what can it do? The Pixel Stand is a wireless charging dock that’s designed
for the Pixel 3, but capable of powering up any Qi-compatible device. Google
says it outputs up to 10W of power with the Pixel 3 and Pixel 3 XL.

In terms of design, there’s not a huge amount to really talk about. The Stand
is very… minimal. It’s white, and features a circular base with a ridge at the
front and what looks like a backplate jutting out from middle.

These are, of course, what you’re supposed to place your phone between, as
shown below.

it does a whole lot more.
[#pixel3](https://twitter.com/hashtag/pixel3?src=hash&ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw)

2018](https://twitter.com/madebygoogle/status/1049696865300701184?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw)

When docked, the Stand tilts your phone back slightly, making it easy to see
everything on-screen. From here, it can also turn your handset into a digital
photo frame of sorts, showcasing images from Google Photos. Hopefully nothing
rude though.

**Read more:[Best Android phones](https://www.trustedreviews.com/best/best-
android-phones-3438996)**

Album covers will appear on-screen if you’re playing music, and if you’re a
smart home ninja with a Nest Hello video doorbell, you’ll get a live feed on
your Pixel handset’s screen when it’s docked on the Stand.

It can also display things like your calendar and weather from the Stand, but
Google wants users to predominantly interact with docked phones through Google
Assistant.

Here are some quick links to learn more about some of the other new products
announced at Made by Google.

  * **[Pixel 3 and Pixel 3 XL](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/google-pixel-3-release-date-specs-price-3316812) **
  * **[Pixel Slate](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/google-pixel-slate-specs-release-date-price-3601351)**
  * **[Google Home Hub](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/google-home-hub-uk-release-date-price-3583109)**

**Are you tempted by the Google Pixel Stand? Share your thoughts with us on
Twitter @TrustedReviews.**
